user.title: Initial Setup
user.description:
Welcome to use this integration plugin!
Exclusively written and produced by [@knoop7](https://github.com/knoop7)

Strictly prohibited for commercial use, secondary modifications and related derivatives
Violations will result in stopping updates and subsequent maintenance code


**Traditional Calendar:**
• Real-time display of traditional lunar calendar information
• Accurate prediction of 24 solar terms
• Daily fortune, suitable and unsuitable guidance
• Custom edit holidays

**Birthday Management:**
• Family member birthdays
• Related BaZi, birthday reminder functions

**Event Management:**
• Investment and financial reminders
• Work schedule reminders
• Meeting and dining reminders
• Anniversary reminders

birthday_ai_edit.title: AI Birthday Fortune Configuration
birthday_ai_edit.description:
Free public welfare interface: [Click to get API key](https://api.chatanywhere.tech/v1/oauth/free/render)

Free version supports gpt-5, gpt-4o, gpt-4.1 5 times/day; supports deepseek-r1, deepseek-v3.1 30 times/day; supports gpt-4o-mini, gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4.1-mini, gpt-4.1-nano, gpt-5-mini, gpt-5-nano 200 times/day.

Recommended to use deepseek-r1 model, best for AI fortune telling predictions.

edit_holidays.title: Holiday Configuration
edit_holidays.description:
**Usage Tutorial:**
Configuration file uses YAML format, supports setting **customdays** (custom holidays) **holidays** (holidays) **workdays** (workdays), each date format is **YYYY-MM-DD**, supports comments, note: prevent other special characters from entering and damaging normal integration operation.
